question: Do you currently have a fever?
Have you experienced a persistent cough?
Are you having difficulty breathing or shortness of breath?
Have you noticed a sudden loss of taste or smell?
Do you have muscle or body aches?
Have you been experiencing fatigue or weakness?
Do you have a sore throat?
Have you had close contact with someone diagnosed with COVID-19 in the last 14 days?
Have you recently traveled to an area with a high number of COVID-19 cases?
Do you have chills or repeated shaking with chills?
Have you experienced nausea, vomiting, or diarrhea?
Have you been in crowded places or attended large gatherings recently?
Do you have any pre-existing health conditions that may increase the severity of COVID-19 symptoms?
Are you currently pregnant or have you recently given birth?
Are you over the age of 65 or in a high-risk group?
